alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Currituck; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 16 at 7:09PM EDT until May 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 228 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA BERTIE CAMDEN CHOWAN CURRITUCK GATES HERTFORD PASQUOTANK PERQUIMANS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN EASTERN VIRGINIA MATHEWS NORTHAMPTON IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA ACCOMACK CITY OF CHESAPEAKE CITY OF HAMPTON CITY OF NORFOLK CITY OF POQUOSON CITY OF PORTSMOUTH CITY OF SUFFOLK CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AHOSKIE, BAVON, BOWERS HILL, CAPE CHARLES, CAPE COLONY, CHESAPEAKE AIRPORT, CHINCOTEAGUE, CURRITUCK, DEEP CREEK, EDENHOUSE, EDENTON, ELIZABETH CITY, EXMORE, FENTRESS, GATESVILLE, GREAT BRIDGE, GREENBACKVILLE, GREENBRIER, HAMPTON, HANCOCK, HERTFORD, HORNTOWN, HORSESHOE, LILLY, MACEDONIA, MAVATON, MERRY HILL, MIDWAY, MOUNT PLEASANT, NEW CHURCH, NEW POINT, NEW POINT COMFORT, NORFOLK, ONANCOCK, PEARY, POQUOSON, PORTSMOUTH, QUITSNA, SAINT JOHNS, SHARON, SUFFOLK, VALHALLA, VIRGINIA BEACH, AND WINDSOR.

area.areaDesc: Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Currituck; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank; Perquimans
